action.action-desc: Mrs. Kirkpatrick of Arizona (for herself and Mr. Jones) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the required reduction in the amount of the accelerated death benefit payable to certain terminally ill persons insured under Servicemembers’ Group Life Insurance or Veterans’ Group Life Insurance.

section.header: Elimination of reduction in amount of accelerated death benefit for terminally ill persons insured under SGLI or VGLI

subsection.text: Section 1980(b)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking reduced by and all that follows through the Secretary.

The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a payment of an accelerated death benefit under section 1980 of title 38, United States Code, made after the date of the enactment of this Act.
